data.eml:eml: Description of the female of Dicterias atrosanguinea Selys 1853, with notes on male genital ligula and male behavior (Odonata: Dicteriadidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vilela, Diogo Silva, Guillermo-Ferreira, Rhainer, Cordero-Rivera, Adolfo (2018): Description of the female of Dicterias atrosanguinea Selys 1853, with notes on male genital ligula and male behavior (Odonata: Dicteriadidae). Zootaxa 4374 (3): 441-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4374.3.7
